comment: I am totally fed up with this.. WTF is "black history month"? that would be erm... "history" PC nonsense when a black man is trying to play James Bond... The BBC is constantly shoehorning BAME into every acting part. its just farcical. "UP NEXT .. Whoopi Goldberg in Queen Victoria goes to Spring Break..."
